testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the pay grades
testcase.name: Verify the edit currency functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in Pay Grades page........................................passed When the user clicks on Edit button in "Bala_Grade" Pay Grades page.........passed And the user clicks on Edit button in "Indian Rupee"........................passed When user edits the parameters "20000.00","30000.00"........................passed And the currency dropdown is not enabled....................................passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add Currency Page.....................passed Then the edited currency salaries "20000.00","30000.00" are updated in the records.passed
